#define SET_SEEN_DATE_PLUS_DAYS ( rel,
plus_days   ) 
Value:
{ \
  time_t plus_t = (rel) + (plus_days) * 24 * 60 * 60; \
  struct tm plus_tm; \
  gmtime_r(&plus_t, &plus_tm); \
  seenYear = plus_tm.tm_year; \
  seenMonth = plus_tm.tm_mon; \
  seenDay = plus_tm.tm_mday; \
  }
